headline.main: The Grip Of the Liquid Diet: A special report:   Dieters, Craving Balance, Are Battling Fears of Food

docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: Joy Segal's desk on the second floor of Zabar's was a fortress of envelopes full of chocolate-flavored formula diet powder. The aroma of bread and pastries rose from the store below, but Mrs. Segal was immune to its temptation. She smiled triumphantly.
